version_description:
--- NEW: VIDEO HILIGHTS ---
When you select videos to import, you can now add HiLights, to tell Quik where the best moments in your video are. For each HiLight, Quik will cut the perfect clip around that moment.

--- HILIGHTS + GOPRO PLUS ---

--- NEW: VIDEO HILIGHTS ---
When you select videos to import, you can now add HiLights, to tell Quik where the best moments in your video are. For each HiLight, Quik will cut the perfect clip around that moment.

--- HILIGHTS + GOPRO PLUS ---

--- NEW: VIDEO HILIGHTS ---
When you select videos to import, you can now add HiLights, to tell Quik where the best moments in your video are. For each HiLight, Quik will cut the perfect clip around that moment.

--- HILIGHTS + GOPRO PLUS ---

--- NEW: VIDEO HILIGHTS ---
When you select videos to import, you can now add HiLights, to tell Quik where the best moments in your video are. For each HiLight, Quik will cut the perfect clip around that moment.

--- HILIGHTS + GOPRO PLUS ---

--- NEW MUSIC EXPERIENCE ---
+ Find the perfect song by browsing categories while editing
+ Quik remembers imported songs for easy access in the editor
+ New "Unmute all videos" feature when removing the soundtrack
+ New: support for m4a, mp4,

--- NEW: FOR YOU NOW ---
When you open Quik and have recently captured photos & videos, For You Now will show you all the shots from the last 24 hours, so you're always one tap away from making a beautiful story of your day. This is PURE GOLD for y

--- NEW: FOR YOU NOW ---
When you open Quik and have recently captured photos & videos, For You Now will show you all the shots from the last 24 hours, so you're always one tap away from making a beautiful story of your day. This is PURE GOLD for y
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements

--- NEW: DRAFTS ---
Do you need to work on multiple edits? Now you can by saving projects as drafts! Save as many drafts as you want. Quik will save them for 7 days.

--- NEW: ADVANCED EDITING OPTIONS ---
+ SPEED - Make any video play faster,

--- NEW: DRAFTS ---
Do you need to work on multiple edits? Now you can by saving projects as drafts! Save as many drafts as you want. Quik will save them for 7 days.

--- NEW: ADVANCED EDITING OPTIONS ---
+ SPEED - Make any video play faster,

--- NEW STYLE: BOXED ---
Elegant storytelling, expressive motion… Boxed shows your photos, videos in full, within a dynamic frame, offers beautiful text animations. Comes in light or dark variations.

--- NEW: SAVE IN 60 FPS ---
To save your video stories with buttery smoothness, try the new 60 fps option!
If you shoot your videos with high frame rates, you’re going to love the results.
Enable it in the Quik settings screen. When saving in 60

--- NEW: SAVE IN 60 FPS ---
To save your video stories with buttery smoothness, try the new 60 fps option!
If you shoot your videos with high frame rates, you’re going to love the results.
Enable it in the Quik settings screen. When saving in 60

--- NOW SUPPORTS QUIKSTORIES ---
Quik works with the free GoPro app to bring you QuikStories—awesome videos made automatically from your latest HERO5 footage.

--- NEW: PORTRAIT FORMAT ---
Love Instagram Stories and Snapchat? Set your video format to portrait, and share your favorite moments in full screen.

--- NEW: SMART CAPTIONS ---
Quik suggests captions and emojis for your videos based on where

--- NEW: PORTRAIT FORMAT ---
Love Instagram Stories and Snapchat? Set your video format to portrait, and share your favorite moments in full screen.

--- NEW: SMART CAPTIONS ---
Quik suggests captions and emojis for your videos based on where

--- NEW: TRIM MODES ---
Enjoy a redesigned video trimming interface, and try the new smart trim modes!
+ Action looks for jumps and speed
+ Travel looks for panoramic shots
+ People looks for voice and faces
You can also let Quik do its mag

--- NEW: TRIM MODES ---
Enjoy a redesigned video trimming interface, and try the new smart trim modes!
+ Action looks for jumps and speed
+ Travel looks for panoramic shots
+ People looks for voice and faces
You can also let Quik do its mag

New in 4.7.1:
+ New song: "Run wild" by Thutmose (feat. NoMBe)
+ Bug fixes and small improvements
